name: Hotel Marcel
description:
Created in 8 hours for a private game jam with friends.

Code - Enjl

Art - sarn

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows/Left stick (Left, right) - Move, adjust difficulty (main menu)
  • Space/Gamepad buttons - Shoot, Reload, Start Game
  • +, -/Shoulder buttons - Adjust opacity of inactive elements
